text: Jesuit schools in Ireland include: == Primary schools == *Scoil Iognáid, Galway *St Declan's School, Dublin == Secondary schools == *Belvedere College, Dublin, founded in 1832 *Clongowes Wood College, County Kildare, founded in 1814 *Coláiste Iognáid, Galway, founded in 1861 *Crescent College Comprehensive, Limerick, founded in 1859 *Gonzaga College, Dublin, founded in 1950 *Mungret College, Limerick, founded in 1882; merged with Crescent College Comprehensive in 1973 *St Stanislaus College, Tullabeg, Offaly, founded in 1818; merged with Clongowes Wood College in 1886 Jesuit Jesuit
title: List of Jesuit schools in Ireland
